long_description: The simple Park Chain Wear Indicator helps assess the health of a bike chain, so you can maintain optimum drivetrain performance. Gauge accurately indicates when a chain reaches either 0.5% or 0.75% wear, the point at which most chain manufacturers suggest replacement. Updated design includes permanent measurement markings, a longer length and improved accuracy. The Park Chain Wear Indicator is made from precision, laser-cut steel.
short_description: The simple Park Chain Wear Indicator helps assess the health of a bike chain, so you can maintain optimum drivetrain performance.
